attributes.action: Get Nick Clegg to resign to save the country paying his Salary.
attributes.additional_details: Rather than ask "rich" pensioners to give up their Bus Passes, Free TV and Winter Heating alowances. Those same "rich" pensioners that have worked and paid Taxes, created Wealth for the country and are often the most generous when giving to charity and good causes as well as voluntering. Lets get of one huge Cabinet Salary. ie that of the Deputy Prime Minister himself.
